links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Michael Bakewell''' is a British producer and director. He was the first "Head of Plays" at the [[BBC]], and would work actively in the broadcast's radio plays. He assisted [[Brian Sibley]] in the adaptation of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' for the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series]].
